tool.name: MzTabExporter
tool.description: Exports various XML formats to an mzTab file.
tool.command:
MzTabExporter
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_force): "$adv_opts.param_force" #else $adv_opts.param_force #end if #end if #end if

param.name: param_in
param.label: Input files used to generate the mzTab file

tool.help:
Exports various XML formats to an mzTab file.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_MzTabExporter.html
